TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_R’uyan, title = R’uyan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/R’uyan} }

S.FORM: alang R'uyan ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Gpho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 92 buwan, 237 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 89% kyan ku 212 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 11% kyan ku 25 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 82%, Amis 4%, Bunun 2%, saySiyat 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na R'uyan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na R'uyan hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na R'uyan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na R'uyan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'llaw na R'uyan hya' ga Heku'. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang R'oyan ga niya mki sko Sincik Keng ato Gpho go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 92 bowan, 237 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 89% kyan ko 212 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 11% kyan ko 25 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 82%, Amis 4%, Bonon 2%, saySiyat 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na R'oyan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na R'oyan hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na R'oyan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na R'oyan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'llaw na R'oyan hya' ga Heko'. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
